ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He was created from a spurting fluid,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He was created of spurting water
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He was created of a gushing fluid,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He has been created from an ejected drop of fluid
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He is created from a water gushing forth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He is created of water pouring forth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: he was created of gushing water
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He is created from a gushing fluid
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He was created from spurting fluid,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He is created from a water drip-ping,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He was created from an effusing fluid
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He is created from a drop emitted-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He is created from a water gushing forth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He was created from ejaculated water
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He was created from gushing liquid.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He was created from a fluid, ejected,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [86:6] the response is: He was created from a gushing fluid, gushing forth from the man and the woman into the womb,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Allah then explained, saying: (He is created from a gushing fluid) into the womb of a woman
